# 0.1.0 (2016-12-24)

## Features

Implemented the main shell script theme file [`nord.sh`](https://github.com/nordtheme/gnome-terminal/blob/develop/src/sh/nord.sh). (@svengreb, #1, c2282cd9)

Detailed information about features and install instructions can be found in the [README](https://github.com/nordtheme/gnome-terminal/blob/develop/README.md#installation) and in the [project wiki](https://github.com/nordtheme/gnome-terminal/wiki).

<p align="center"><img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nordtheme/gnome-terminal/develop/assets/scrot-colortest.png"/><br><strong>htop</strong><br><img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nordtheme/gnome-terminal/develop/assets/scrot-htop.png"/></p>
